text: The Provisional Government of the Democratic Federal Yugoslavia, was the government of Yugoslavia in 1945 during World War II. on March 7 1945, the national committee for the liberation of Yugoslavia and the Yugoslav government-in-exile merged into the Provisional Government of the Democratic Federal Yugoslavia. With the partisans leader Josip Broz Tito as prime minister. In May, germany surrendered. Ending World War II for Yugoslavia. The government would last until November 1945 when the Federal People's Republic of Yugoslavia was formed. == Leaders == Josip Broz Tito as prime minister Peter II as king (de jure) Category:History of Yugoslavia Category:1945 in Europe
title: Provisional Government of the Democratic Federal Yugoslavia
